metadata.title: CVE-2021-32476 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial-of-service risk was identified in the draft files area, due to itnot respecting user file upload limits. Moodle versions 3.10 to 3.10.3, 3.9to 3.9.6, 3.8 to 3.8.8, 3.5 to 3.5.17 and earlier unsupported versions areaffected.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
